title: Let's Vent – AI Wellness Copilot
description: GPT-4 powered mental health journaling tool – 2nd place at CreateHERfest Hackathon.

title: Mosaic Culture – AI Storytelling App
description: LangChain & RAG-powered cultural storytelling platform. Curates unique narratives.

title: BlockWhere – Web3 Identity Verifier
description: Smart contract–connected AI agent that validates blockchain identities.

title: Celo Emoji Translator
description: A fun Celo blockchain-powered dApp that translates emoji phrases into smart contract transactions. Built as part of an ecosystem onboarding challenge to demonstrate Celo compatibility and UX experimentation.

title: GoddessFlight – AI + Blockchain Travel Oracle
description: A poetic AI-powered travel oracle that delivers blockchain-backed flight guidance. Merges LLMs with symbolic interpretation and cryptographic randomness.

title: AI Accord – Farcaster Frame Quiz
description: A sci-fi ethics quiz built on Farcaster using Frames. Matches users with fictional AI archetypes based on their philosophical answers. Encourages exploration of identity and alignment through decentralized UI.

title: GoddessCryptoOracle – Hackathon Submission
description: A mythologically themed Web3 oracle built during a hackathon to simulate divine responses on-chain. Features a smart contract + frontend combination that delivers symbolic messages.
